intro: Linociera laxiflora, commonly known as the slender-flowered linociera, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its slender stems and small, white or pale yellow flowers. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and often have a velvety texture. Linociera laxiflora is typically found in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories.
